SRCCON 2018 • June 28 & 29 in Minneapolis Apply to attend!

Call for Participation

We’re excited that we’ve been able to open up a second batch of tickets to SRCCON and that you’re interested in participating at SRCCON 2018! We ask that you tell us a little about yourself and your work. This form is how we will allocate the remaining tickets for SRCCON. We’re reviewing applications on a rolling basis, and the form will remain open as long as there are tickets available.

For a sense of what we’ll be getting into this year at SRCCON, take a look at the accepted sessions list. You can also learn about the overall SRCCON program and our CFP process.

Please feel free to reach out to us at srccon@opennews.org with any questions. Or if you’re all set, the participation form is below!

This form requires JavaScript to complete.

About SRCCON events

OpenNews runs several journalism events each year. The largest is this conference: SRCCON, a mid-year conference for about 300 developers, designers, and data analysts. We also gather small working groups and convenings, and in 2017 added our first topically focused SRCCON-style event, SRCCON:WORK in Philadelphia.
